About this website
==================

Oct 1, 2024 · First published August 23 2018 · By [![James Cridland](https://podnews.net/static/authors/james-cridland.jpg)](https://james.cridland.net/) [James Cridland](https://james.cridland.net/) · 5 minutes to read

This website, our newsletter and our podcast are intended to be a quick, daily update with global news for those involved in podcasting and on-demand audio. It launched in May 2017.

* [Here’s how to submit a news story to us](https://podnews.net/article/submissions-and-disclosures), and our relevant editorial disclosures.
* [Here’s how to submit a podcast for news coverage](https://podnews.net/article/submit-a-podcast-to-us).

As of November 7, 2024, we have **32,260** active newsletter subscribers, based [all round the world](https://podnews.net/about/subscriber-countries). We have an average open-rate of around 43%, significantly above the industry average. Our podcast achieved [**68,069** downloads last month](https://op3.dev/show/55f8007aec094899a02fd44273aa6558?utm_source=podnews.net&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=podnews.net%3A2018-08-23). Our website’s articles (daily newsletters and in-depth articles only) have been viewed **2,129,970** times over the past 30 days.

Our [privacy-aware](https://podnews.net/privacy) website achieves a carbon rating of A+, and in May 2024 was cleaner than [93%](https://www.websitecarbon.com/website/podnews-net/?utm_source=podnews.net&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=podnews.net%3A2018-08-23) of webpages globally.

> “Looking at our incoming web traffic sources, it’s obvious that our audience trusts Podnews the most for their podcasting news.” - a Director of Growth Marketing for a podcast advertising company

It’s read by senior podcasting industry management, including CEOs and divisional heads. Email subscriptions include users within:

* podcast producers (eg PRX, BBC, ABC, Gimlet, NPR)
* ad marketplace (eg Acast, AdvertiseCast, Triton Digital, Adswizz, Whooshkaa)
* hosting companies (eg Libsyn, Buzzsprout, Blubrry, Omny Studio, Podbean)
* advertising industry (eg Oxford Road, Veritone, Magellan AI, Ad Results Media)
* others involved in the industry (eg Apple, Edison Research)
* podcast listeners and fans

And, of course, we’ve [plenty of RSS feeds and other integrations](https://podnews.net/article/our-stuff-on-your-site).

Editorial team information
--------------------------

![An embedded video](https://i.podnews.network/r/y/0/NSGaoxDdmA8.jpeg)

Click to play this video from YouTube[YouTube’s privacy policy](https://www.youtube.com/t/privacy)

It is curated by [James Cridland](https://james.cridland.net/?utm_source=podnews.net&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=podnews.net%3A2018-08-23). With over 28 years in the radio and online business, in 2005 James helped launch the first daily podcast from a UK radio station and the world’s first radio station streaming app, and has been operating online publications since 1993. He offers a truly international view: a Brit, living in Australia, working for companies across the world including North America. This daily newsletter is a unique opportunity to contextualise the international podcast landscape.

Title sponsorship is available on a monthly basis. Please contact [sales@podnews.net](mailto:sales@podnews.net) for more details. We also have [other ways to support us](https://podnews.net/article/advertising).

James is an accomplished public speaker, and is available to [speak or moderate](https://james.cridland.net/speaking?utm_source=podnews.net&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=podnews.net%3A2018-08-23) at your next event.

To link to Podnews, we’ve some [banners and logos](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1-8Y2yqRrePIaa4Uz93HXzgsYc9JbCrSy?usp=sharing&utm_source=podnews.net&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=podnews.net%3A2018-08-23) available; and a [short audio promo](https://podnews.net/audio/podnewsnet_promo.mp3).

Impressum
---------

This website is published by Podnews LLC (“us”, “we”). We are grateful to the traditional custodians of the area in Australia where we live and work, the Turrbal and Jagera people, and pay our respects to their elders: past, present and future.

**Publisher:** [James Cridland](http://james.cridland.net/): [editor@podnews.net](mailto:editor@podnews.net).

**Editorial address:** 29 Outlook Crescent, Bardon QLD 4065 AUSTRALIA

**Telephone number:** +61 447 692743. Before you call: here’s [our local time](https://www.google.com/search?q=time+in+brisbane&utm_source=podnews.net&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=podnews.net%3A2018-08-23).

Our editorial policy on AI
--------------------------

We occasionally use FastGPT by [Kagi](https://kagi.com/?utm_source=podnews.net&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=podnews.net%3A2018-08-23) or similar tools to summarise our own work - you’ll see this most often in podcast descriptions for Podnews Extra.

We don’t use AI otherwise, nor do we use AI photography tools, with the exception of when we’re writing some stories specifically about AI. We’ll credit the AI tool used if that’s the case.

Press releases and photographs submitted to us may have used AI in their generation. If they’ve not told us they’re using them, we can’t tell you. However, we’re pretty good at spotting when press releases or stories elsewhere are using AI, and we try not to link to them if we suspect that they’re AI generated.

Correction Policy
-----------------

We welcome requests for correction or clarification to updates@podnews.net.

At our discretion, we may update the original article, including publicly updating the last-modified date (in schema as 'dateModified’). We do not explicitly highlight corrections nor retain incorrect text on archived articles. If it’s a correction we feel we should highlight, we’ll do so in the next available newsletter, hyperlinked to the amended page.

Privacy Policy
--------------

Our full privacy policy is [on this page](https://podnews.net/privacy).

DMCA
----

Podnews LLC is committed to complying with US copyright and related laws. We have a number of automated pages within our website that use RSS feeds. Owners of copyrighted works who believe that their rights under US copyright law have been infringed may take advantage of certain provisions of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 (“DMCA”) to report alleged infringements. A copyright owner of any content should contact us immediately to report any concerns of infringement by providing notice to our Designated Agent as required by the DMCA, Title 17 U.S.C. § 512. We would prefer notices to be provided by email to editor@podnews.net or by phone to +61 447 692743; our Designated Agent postal address is Podnews LLC, 220 Las Colinas Blvd E Ste C210, Irving TX 75039-5500 USA.

Please send: a) the electronic or physical signature of the owner of the copyright or the person authorised to act on the owner’s behalf; b) identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed; c) the URL of the materials claimed to be infringing, or information reasonably sufficient to permit us to locate the materials; d) your name, address, telephone number and email address; e) a statement by you that you have good faith belief that the disputed use of the material is not authorised by the copyright owner, its agent or the law; f) a statement by you, made under penalty of perjury, that the above information in your notice is accurate and that you are the copyright owner or are authorised to act on the copyright owner’s behalf.

Misrepresentations of infringement can result in liability for monetary damages. You may wish to consult an attorney before taking any action pursuant to the DMCA. We reserve the right to publish DMCA requests.

Copyright, trademarks and terms of use
--------------------------------------

This website is copyright © Podnews LLC. Reproduction is prohibited without our written permission.

Podnews® is US trademark no. 5,575,836 registered Oct 02, 2018; and Canadian trademark TMA 1,092,031 registered Jan 20, 2021, with further trademarks pending.

Information you submit to us with the intention of being published is deemed to be licensed to us for our use.

Information is provided “as is” without any warranty as to accuracy, quality or fitness for purpose. You use this website at your own risk.

Geolocation data [© OpenStreetMap contributors](https://www.openstreetmap.org/copyright?utm_source=podnews.net&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=podnews.net%3A2018-08-23)

**Please don’t scrape this website’s HTML.** We apply rate-limiting for some areas of our website and you will be blocked if you abuse our services. Chances are we’ve an API to help you if you want one, or can point you somewhere; please get in touch instead.
